name: Rope - Free
description:
Swing through the jungle game. Grab the liana and fly through the forest and collect all the bananas. Rescue your friends who are trapped by poachers. Avoid the spiky flowers and chestnuts. Listen to the crazy monkey imitators.

For the family on vacation and the kids in the backseat of your car.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to play:
Tap left/right side to jump.
Tap again to mid air jump.
Bar shows when you will grab the same rope again.
You grab a new rope directly.
Mid air jump to grab any rope directly.
When hurt you must wait for bar.
